installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

# Function to get the latest release version from GitHub
get_latest_release() {
    curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/counterstrikesharp-panel/css-bans/releases/latest" | # Get latest release from GitHub api
    grep '"tag_name":' |                                         # Get tag line
    sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/'                                 # Pluck JSON value
}

# Change to the server directory
cd /mnt/server

# Update apk and install git, curl, and unzip
apk --update add git curl unzip

# Clone the repository containing nginx and php-fpm files
git clone https://github.com/hobsRKM/ptero-eggs.git ./temp

# Copy the required files and directories to the server directory
cp -r ./temp/nginx /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php-fpm /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/webroot /mnt/server/
cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server/

# Make the start script executable
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh

# Clean up the temporary directory
rm -rf ./temp

# Create necessary directories
mkdir /mnt/server/tmp
mkdir /mnt/server/logs

# Set permissions for the Laravel storage directory
chmod -R 777 /mnt/server/webroot/storage

# Check if USER_UPLOAD is set to true or 1
if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "Assuming user knows what they are doing. Have a good day."
    exit 0
fi

# Get the latest release version
LATEST_VERSION=$(get_latest_release)

# Check if latest version exists, otherwise fall back to 3.2
if [ -z "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
    LATEST_VERSION="3.2"
fi

# Download and unzip the CSS Bans package into the webroot directory
wget "https://github.com/counterstrikesharp-panel/css-bans/releases/download/${LATEST_VERSION}/cssbans.v${LATEST_VERSION}.zip" -O /mnt/server/webroot/cssbans.v${LATEST_VERSION}.zip
unzip /mnt/server/webroot/cssbans.v${LATEST_VERSION}.zip -d /mnt/server/webroot/

# Set permissions for the Laravel storage directory again, if needed
chmod -R 777 /mnt/server/webroot/storage
